constantValues: The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

members.name: deviceComponentNumber

constantValues: The locally assigned unique identification by the software. For example: handle ID.

members.description: The locally assigned unique identification by the software. For example: handle ID.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: languageCodeId

constantValues: The language code for the human-readable text string produced by the device. This language code will follow the IETF language tag. Example: en-US.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The language code for the human-readable text string produced by the device. This language code will follow the IETF language tag. Example: en-US.

members.name: lastSystemChange

constantValues: The timestamp for the most recent system change which includes device configuration or setting change.

members.description: The timestamp for the most recent system change which includes device configuration or setting change.

members.name: measurementPrinciple

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The physical principle of the measurement. For example: thermal, chemical, acoustical, etc.

members.description: The physical principle of the measurement. For example: thermal, chemical, acoustical, etc.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'measurementPrinciple_display' is added to the 'DeviceComponent' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'measurementPrinciple'
addSupportingAttribute.name: measurementPrinciple_display

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the device component entity.

members.description: The name of the device component entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: parameterGroupId

constantValues: The parameter group supported by the current device component that is based on some nomenclature, e.g. cardiovascular.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The parameter group supported by the current device component that is based on some nomenclature, e.g. cardiovascular.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: parentId

constantValues: The link to the parent resource. For example: Channel is linked to its VMD parent.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The link to the parent resource. For example: Channel is linked to its VMD parent.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: sourceId

constantValues: The link to the source Device that contains administrative device information such as manufacture, serial number, etc.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The link to the source Device that contains administrative device information such as manufacture, serial number, etc.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: typeId

constantValues: The component type as defined in the object-oriented or metric nomenclature partition.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The component type as defined in the object-oriented or metric nomenclature partition.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'DeviceComponent' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Device Component

members.description: Reason for the status of the Device Component

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'DeviceComponent' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

definitions.description: The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.
